I am a **Doctoral Candidate in Finance at the University of Pittsburgh, Katz Graduate School of Business**.

I will be joining the **University of South Carolina, Darla Moore School of Business** in August 2024, as an **Assistant Professor of Finance**.

My research focuses on **empirical corporate finance**, with applications in **political economy** and **labor economics**.
